projects.name: R&D Project
projects.dialog: This Project has two modules, each with a different cost, make sure to allocate resources evenly for this project to succeed.

projects.name: RPG Game
projects.dialog: This Project has five modules, each with a different cost, make sure to allocate lots of resources to AI Engine for this project to succeed. The Client isn't much interested in the Character Creation for this project.

projects.name: Software Simulator
projects.dialog: This project has three modules, each with a different cost. The Client seems enthused about simulating time.
